text: walilah mulk ma fi alsmwat wama fi al'ard wama bynhma. walaqad eahidna 'iilaa aladhin 'uetu alkitab min qablikum min alyhwd walnsara, waeahidna 'iilaykum kdhlk -ya 'umat mhmd- btqwa allah teala, walqiam bi'amrih wajtnab nhyh, wbyanna lakum 'anakum 'iina tjhdu whdanyt allah taealaa wshreh fa'iinah subhanah ghaniun enkm; li'ana lah jmye ma fi alsmwat walard. wakan allah ghnyaan ean khlqh, hmydana fi sifatih wafealh
